title: Timestamp Converter
description: Convert between Unix timestamps (seconds or milliseconds) and local date-time.

helper.localNotice: ISO input/output is based on your local timezone.

error.invalidSeconds: Enter a valid Unix timestamp in seconds.
error.invalidMilliseconds: Enter a valid Unix timestamp in milliseconds.
error.invalidIso: Enter a valid local date and time.

openGraph.title: Timestamp Converter
openGraph.description: Convert Unix timestamps to local date-time and back.
